title: Unbreakable (2000) with extras [Ghost]
description:
MOVIE INFORMATION
_________________

Title: Unbreakable
Year: 2000
IMDb rating: 7.2
Director: M. Night Shyamalan
Genre: Drama/Mystery/Sci-Fi/Thriller
Featuring Bruce Williams, Samuel L. Jackson, Robin Wright
Description: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.


PRODUCT
_______

Format: DVD
Edition: Theatrical Edition, 102 minutes (according to box), Dutch retail 2008
Spoken Language: English
Subtitle Language: English
Subtitles taken from DVD, converted to Subrip format with OCR in SubExtractor. Fixed italics and OCR errors.
Final size:
- Unbreakable: 694MB (659MB video, 35.3MB audio)
- Deleted Scenes (extra): 185MB (176MB video, 9.41MB audio)
- The Making of Unbreakable (extra): 93.1MB (88.4MB video, 4.62MB audio)
- Trailer (extra): 15.0MB (14.2MB video, 760kB audio)


CODECS AND CHANNELS: Unbreakable
________________________________

Video Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC
Resolution: 704x438
Framerate: 25fps
Average Bitrate: 901kbps
Preprocessing with AviSynth script, to auto-crop, improve blacks, convert to YV12 and degrain.
Encoded with x264: program --preset placebo --tune film --pass 2 --bitrate 900 --stats ".stats" --deblock -2:-3 --ratetol 4.0 --rc-lookahead 250 --merange 64 --output "output" "input"

Audio Codec: AAC-HE
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 48kbps
Encoded with Q-AAC

Subtitles: Subrip
Source: DVD Retail
Slightly modified:
- Added italics.

CODECS AND CHANNELS: Deleted Scenes
___________________________________

Video Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC
Resolution: 704x572 (letterboxing to 438p for movie cuts)
Framerate: 25fps
Average Bitrate: 874kbps
Preprocessing with AviSynth script, to auto-crop, convert to YV12, deinterlace and degrain.
Encoded with x264: program --preset placebo --tune film --pass 2 --bitrate 900 --stats ".stats" --deblock -2:-2 --ratetol 4.0 --rc-lookahead 250 --merange 64 --output "output" "input"

Audio Codec: AAC-HE
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 48kbps
Encoded with Q-AAC

Subtitles: Subrip
Source: Hand-written using the timecodes on the DVD of the Dutch subtitles.
Slightly modified:
- Some re-syncing was required (-300ms).
- Some lines were split up due to being too long. All of it displays properly in VLC now, but in other players it might still be too long depending on the font size.
